verses.name: Matthew 22:1
verses.text: And Jesus answered and spake unto them again by parables, and said,

verses.name: Matthew 22:2
verses.text: The kingdom of heaven is like unto a certain king, which made a marriage for his son,

verses.name: Matthew 22:3
verses.text: And sent forth his servants to call them that were bidden to the wedding: and they would not come.

verses.name: Matthew 22:4
verses.text: Again, he sent forth other servants, saying, Tell them which are bidden, Behold, I have prepared my dinner: my oxen and my fatlings are killed, and all things are ready: come unto the marriage.

verses.name: Matthew 22:5
verses.text: But they made light of it, and went their ways, one to his farm, another to his merchandise:
